verses.verse: בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> At that time הַהִ֔יא <WH1931> he חָלָ֖ה <WH2470> fell sick אֲבִיָּ֥ה <WH29> Abijah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יָרָבְעָֽם׃ <WH3379> of Jeroboam

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יָרָבְעָ֜ם <WH3379> And Jeroboam לְאִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <WH802> to his wife ק֤וּמִי <WH6965> Arise נָא֙ <WH4994> now וְהִשְׁתַּנִּ֔ית <WH8138> I pray thee and disguise וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> they will not יֵֽדְע֔וּ <WH3045> thyself that thou be not known כִּי־ <WH3588> for [אַתִּי כ] (אַ֖תְּ <WH859> you ק) אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> to be the wife יָרָבְעָ֑ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam וְהָלַ֣כְתְּ <WH1980> and get שִׁלֹ֗ה <WH7887> thee to Shiloh הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold שָׁם֙ <WH8033> is there אֲחִיָּ֣ה <WH281> behold there [is] Ahijah הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> the prophet הֽוּא־ <WH1931> who דִבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> which told עָלַ֛י <WH5921> concerning לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> me that [I should be] king עַל־ <WH5921> over הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> over this people הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וְלָקַ֣חַתְּ <WH3947> And take בְּ֠יָדֵךְ <WH3027> with thee עֲשָׂרָ֨ה <WH6235> ten לֶ֧חֶם <WH3899> loaves וְנִקֻּדִ֛ים <WH5350> and cracknels וּבַקְבֻּ֥ק <WH1228> and a cruse דְּבַ֖שׁ <WH1706> of honey וּבָ֣את <WH935> and go אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> about ה֚וּא <WH1931> He יַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> to him he shall tell לָ֔ךְ מַה־ <WH4100> what יִּֽהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> will happen לַנָּֽעַר׃ <WH5288> thee what shall become of the child

וַתַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> did so כֵּן֙ <WH3651> so אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife יָרָבְעָ֔ם <WH3379> And Jeroboam's וַתָּ֙קָם֙ <WH6965> and arose וַתֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> and went שִׁלֹ֔ה <WH7887> to Shiloh וַתָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and came בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> to the house אֲחִיָּ֑ה <WH281> of Ahijah וַאֲחִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <WH281> But Ahijah לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָכֹ֣ל <WH3201> could לִרְא֔וֹת <WH7200> not see כִּ֛י <WH3588> for קָ֥מוּ <WH6965> were set עֵינָ֖יו <WH5869> for his eyes מִשֵּׂיבֽוֹ׃ <WH7869> by reason of his age ס

וַיהוָ֞ה <WH3068> And the LORD אָמַ֣ר <WH559> said אֶל־ <WH413> concerning אֲחִיָּ֗הוּ <WH281> unto Ahijah הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> Behold the wife יָרָבְעָ֡ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam בָּאָ֣ה <WH935> cometh לִדְרֹשׁ֩ <WH1875> to ask דָּבָ֨ר <WH1697> a thing מֵעִמְּךָ֤ <WH5973> of you אֶל־ <WH413> concerning בְּנָהּ֙ <WH1121> of thee for her son כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for חֹלֶ֣ה <WH2470> for he [is] sick ה֔וּא <WH1931> he כָּזֹ֥ה <WH2090> thus וְכָזֶ֖ה <WH2088> and thus תְּדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> and thus shalt thou say אֵלֶ֑יהָ <WH413> concerning וִיהִ֣י <WH1961> become כְבֹאָ֔הּ <WH935> unto her for it shall be when she cometh in וְהִ֖יא <WH1931> herself מִתְנַכֵּרָֽה׃ <WH5234> that she shall feign herself [to be] another

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> become כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <WH8085> heard אֲחִיָּ֜הוּ <WH281> And it was [so] when Ahijah אֶת־ <WH853> ק֤וֹל <WH6963> the sound רַגְלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH7272> of her feet בָּאָ֣ה <WH935> as she came in בַפֶּ֔תַח <WH6607> at the door וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> that he said בֹּ֖אִי <WH935> Come in אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> thou wife יָרָבְעָ֑ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> why זֶּ֗ה <WH2088> he אַ֚תְּ <WH859> you מִתְנַכֵּרָ֔ה <WH5234> why feignest thou thyself [to be] another וְאָ֣נֹכִ֔י <WH595> I שָׁל֥וּחַ <WH7971> ? for I [am] sent אֵלַ֖יִךְ <WH413> to you קָשָֽׁה׃ <WH7186> to thee [with] heavy

לְכִ֞י <WH1980> Go אִמְרִ֣י <WH559> tell לְיָרָבְעָ֗ם <WH3379> Jeroboam כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel יַ֛עַן <WH3282> Forasmuch as אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> I הֲרִימֹתִ֖יךָ <WH7311> I exalted מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> thee from among הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> the people וָאֶתֶּנְךָ֣ <WH5414> and made נָגִ֔יד <WH5057> thee prince עַ֖ל <WH5921> over עַמִּ֥י <WH5971> over my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וָאֶקְרַ֤ע <WH7167> away אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּמְלָכָה֙ <WH4467> the kingdom מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> from the house דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> of David וָאֶתְּנֶ֖הָ <WH5414> and gave לָ֑ךְ וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not הָיִ֜יתָ <WH1961> been כְּעַבְדִּ֣י <WH5650> it thee and [yet] thou hast not been as my servant דָוִ֗ד <WH1732> David אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> who שָׁמַ֨ר <WH8104> who kept מִצְוֹתַ֜י <WH4687> my commandments וַאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> and who הָלַ֤ךְ <WH1980> along אַחֲרַי֙ <WH310> with בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבָב֔וֹ <WH3824> me with all his heart לַעֲשׂ֕וֹת <WH6213> to do רַ֖ק <WH7535> that הַיָּשָׁ֥ר <WH3477> [that] only [which was] right בְּעֵינָֽי׃ <WH5869> in mine eyes

וַתָּ֣רַע <WH7489> evil לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> But hast done מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who הָי֣וּ <WH1961> become לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> above all that were before וַתֵּ֡לֶךְ <WH1980> gone וַתַּעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> and made לְּךָ֩ אֱלֹהִ֨ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֤ים <WH312> thee other וּמַסֵּכוֹת֙ <WH4541> and molten images לְהַכְעִיסֵ֔נִי <WH3707> to provoke me to anger וְאֹתִ֥י <WH853> הִשְׁלַ֖כְתָּ <WH7993> and hast cast אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> me behind גַוֶּֽךָ׃ <WH1458> thy back ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> therefore הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold מֵבִ֤יא <WH935> Therefore behold I will bring רָעָה֙ <WH7451> evil אֶל־ <WH413> on בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> upon the house יָרָבְעָ֔ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <WH3772> and will cut off לְיָֽרָבְעָם֙ <WH3379> from Jeroboam מַשְׁתִּ֣ין <WH8366> him that pisseth בְּקִ֔יר <WH7023> against the wall עָצ֥וּר <WH6113> [and] him that is shut up וְעָז֖וּב <WH5800> and left בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> in Israel וּבִֽעַרְתִּי֙ <WH1197> and will take away אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> the remnant בֵית־ <WH1004> of the house יָרָבְעָ֔ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after יְבַעֵ֥ר <WH1197> as a man taketh away הַגָּלָ֖ל <WH1557> dung עַד־ <WH5704> until תֻּמּֽוֹ׃ <WH8552> till it be all gone

הַמֵּ֨ת <WH4191> Him that dieth לְיָֽרָבְעָ֤ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam בָּעִיר֙ <WH5892> in the city יֹאכְל֣וּ <WH398> eat הַכְּלָבִ֔ים <WH3611> shall the dogs וְהַמֵּת֙ <WH4191> and him that dieth בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> in the field יֹאכְל֖וּ <WH398> eat ע֣וֹף <WH5775> shall the fowls הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of the air כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for the LORD דִּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> hath spoken

וְאַ֥תְּ <WH859> now you ק֖וּמִי <WH6965> Arise לְכִ֣י <WH1980> go לְבֵיתֵ֑ךְ <WH1004> thee to thine own house בְּבֹאָ֥ה <WH935> enter רַגְלַ֛יִךְ <WH7272> [and] when thy feet הָעִ֖ירָה <WH5892> into the city וּמֵ֥ת <WH4191> shall die הַיָּֽלֶד׃ <WH3206> the child

וְסָֽפְדוּ־ <WH5594> shall mourn ל֤וֹ כָל־ <WH3605> All יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> And all Israel וְקָבְר֣וּ <WH6912> for him and bury אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for זֶ֣ה <WH2088> he לְבַדּ֔וֹ <WH905> alone יָבֹ֥א <WH935> shall come לְיָרָבְעָ֖ם <WH3379> him for he only of Jeroboam אֶל־ <WH413> toward קָ֑בֶר <WH6913> to the grave יַ֣עַן <WH3282> because נִמְצָא־ <WH4672> because in him there is found ב֞וֹ דָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> thing ט֗וֹב <WH2896> [some] good אֶל־ <WH413> toward יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> toward the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> in the house יָרָבְעָֽם׃ <WH3379> of Jeroboam

וְהֵקִים֩ <WH6965> shall raise him up יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> Moreover the LORD ל֥וֹ מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> a king עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> over Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יַכְרִ֛ית <WH3772> who shall cut off אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house יָרָבְעָ֖ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam זֶ֣ה <WH2088> this הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> that day וּמֶ֖ה <WH4100> how long גַּם־ <WH1571> and from עָֽתָּה׃ <WH6258> now

וְהִכָּ֨ה <WH5221> shall smite יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> For the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יָנ֣וּד <WH5110> is shaken הַקָּנֶה֮ <WH7070> as a reed בַּמַּיִם֒ <WH4325> in the water וְנָתַ֣שׁ <WH5428> and he shall root up אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Israel מֵ֠עַל <WH5921> and הָאֲדָמָ֨ה <WH127> land הַטּוֹבָ֤ה <WH2896> out of this good הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> likewise אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which נָתַן֙ <WH5414> which he gave לַאֲב֣וֹתֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1> to their fathers וְזֵרָ֖ם <WH2219> and shall scatter מֵעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> them beyond לַנָּהָ֑ר <WH5104> the river יַ֗עַן <WH3282> because אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which עָשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> because they have made אֶת־ <WH853> אֲשֵׁ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <WH842> their groves מַכְעִיסִ֖ים <WH3707> to anger אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> provoking the LORD

וְיִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> up אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel בִּגְלַ֞ל <WH1558> because חַטֹּ֤אות <WH2403> of the sins יָֽרָבְעָם֙ <WH3379> of Jeroboam אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which חָטָ֔א <WH2398> who did sin וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הֶחֱטִ֖יא <WH2398> to sin אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> and who made Israel

וַתָּ֙קָם֙ <WH6965> arose אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife יָרָבְעָ֔ם <WH3379> And Jeroboam's וַתֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> and departed וַתָּבֹ֣א <WH935> and came תִרְצָ֑תָה <WH8656> to Tirzah הִ֛יא <WH1931> she בָּאָ֥ה <WH935> [and] when she came בְסַף־ <WH5592> to the threshold הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the door וְהַנַּ֥עַר <WH5288> the child מֵֽת׃ <WH4191> died

וַיִּקְבְּר֥וּ <WH6912> And they buried אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> וַיִּסְפְּדוּ־ <WH5594> mourned ל֖וֹ כָּל־ <WH3605> All יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> him and all Israel כִּדְבַ֤ר <WH1697> for him according to the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֔ר <WH1696> which he spake בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand עַבְדּ֖וֹ <WH5650> of his servant אֲחִיָּ֥הוּ <WH281> Ahijah הַנָּבִֽיא׃ <WH5030> the prophet

וְיֶ֙תֶר֙ <WH3499> And the rest דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> of the acts יָֽרָבְעָ֔ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> how נִלְחַ֖ם <WH3898> how he warred וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> and how מָלָ֑ךְ <WH4427> and how he reigned הִנָּ֣ם <WH2009> behold כְּתוּבִ֗ים <WH3789> behold they [are] written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְהַיָּמִים֙ <WH3117> And the days אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after מָלַ֣ךְ <WH4427> reigned יָרָבְעָ֔ם <WH3379> which Jeroboam עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty וּשְׁתַּ֖יִם <WH8147> [were] two שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיִּשְׁכַּב֙ <WH7901> and he slept עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <WH1> with his fathers וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned נָדָ֥ב <WH5070> and Nadab בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place פ

וּרְחַבְעָם֙ <WH7346> And Rehoboam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> of Solomon מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> reigned בִּֽיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> in Judah בֶּן־ <WH1121> old אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> [was] forty וְאַחַ֣ת <WH259> and one שָׁנָה֩ <WH8141> years רְחַבְעָ֨ם <WH7346> Rehoboam בְּמָלְכ֜וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וּֽשֲׁבַ֨ע <WH7651> seven עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֣ה ׀ <WH8141> years מָלַ֣ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem הָ֠עִיר <WH5892> the city אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בָּחַ֨ר <WH977> did choose יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> which the LORD לָשׂ֨וּם <WH7760> to put אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֥וֹ <WH8034> his name שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> out of all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> there And his mother's נַעֲמָ֖ה <WH5279> [was] Naamah הָעַמֹּנִֽית׃ <WH5985> an Ammonitess

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> did יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> And Judah הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיְקַנְא֣וּ <WH7065> and they provoked him to jealousy אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> had done אֲבֹתָ֔ם <WH1> above all that their fathers בְּחַטֹּאתָ֖ם <WH2403> with their sins אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which חָטָֽאוּ׃ <WH2398> which they had committed
